message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to make a counteroffer of $140 for the product.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $160. It's a great product, and I think it's worth every penny.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me make one last attempt. I am willing to pay $150 for the product.
